title: Wrangler Authentics Men's Relaxed Fit Boot Cut Jean
description: TRADITIONAL STYLE. This classic jean is sure to be comfortable and functional for your everyday wear. From the office to a backyard barbeque, this jean is built for versatility and comfort with a timeless silhouette.
FIVE POCKET JEAN. Keeping it classic with this traditional 5-pocket boot cut jean. Made with (2) slant pockets, (2) back patch pockets, and (1) right coin pocket.
RELAXED FIT. Constructed with your comfort in mind, this denim pant is made with 100% cotton or premium flex denim. With a relaxed seat and thigh, this jean sits at the natural waistline.
FITS OVER BOOTS. Built with a relaxed fit boot cut leg, these classic jeans have a comfortable silhouette that fit over your boots.
DURABLE COMFORT. These jeans are made for durability and comfort - made with a soft cotton fabric, these jeans will keep you looking good and comfortable all day.
Wrangler Authentics Men's Relaxed Fit Boot Cut Jean.

This denim boot cut jean is constructed with durable 100% cotton built for long-lasting wear and all-day comfort. Designed with a relaxed boot cut fit through the leg, this comfortable jean sits at the natural waist and features a relaxed seat and thigh.
FEATURES
Durable Materials. 100% cotton or premium flex denim.

Relaxed Fit. Relaxed seat and thigh and sits at the natural waistline.
